title: Course on Advisory Strategies and Concurrent Concept Structure Application for Enhanced Concept Learning (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Targeting adult learners in smartphone-centric, limited technological environments, aiming to improve everyday language proficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can identify concepts required to perform given language tasks with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can establish a learning plan according to advisory strategies and create three or more self-assessment records.
Learners can explain four or more related concepts in connection by utilizing a simultaneous concept structuring strategy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
